actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-812.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4154) to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to remove the maximum age limitation applicable to employees who are protected under such Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4154 (age discrimination in employment).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4154) to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to remove the maximum age limitation applicable to employees who are protected under such Act, and for other purposes.
